properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 7 at 11:01PM EST until February 8 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

The Cumberland River at Pineville
The North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson
The Levisa Fork Big Sandy River at Pikeville
The Levisa Fork Big Sandy River at Paintsville

...The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a
Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky...

The South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville

The Flood Advisory continues for
The Cumberland River at Pineville
* until Saturday morning.
* At 10 PM Friday the stage was 999.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 1002 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to near 1001 feet by after midnight
tomorrow.
* At 1002 feet...Low lying roads flood, including portions of
Straight Creek, Dorton Branch, and Fourmile Road.
properties.instruction:
Continue to monitor NOAA weather radio or your favorite local media
outlet for additional information. If you are in areas affected by
this forecast take necessary precautions.

The next update will be issued by 6 AM.
